#Text=Veszprém
#Text=Veszprém ( German : Weißbrunn , Slovene : Belomost ) is one of Hungary 's oldest cities , in the Transdanubia region .
#Text=In 1009 , it became Hungary 's first episcopal seat .
#Text=Understand
#Text=It lies approximately 15 km ( 9 mi ) north of the Lake Balaton .
#Text=It is the administrative center of the county ( comitatus or ' megye ' ) of the same name .
#Text=City ​​districts

#Text=Belváros , Dózsaváros , Jeruzsálemhegy , Egyetemváros , Füredidomb , Cholnokyváros , Újtelep , Jutasi úti lakótelep , Bakonyalja , Jutaspuszta , Szabadságpuszta , Iparváros , Gyulafirátót , Kádárta .
#Text=Further territorial units : Veszprémvölgy , Reptér , Csatár
#Text=By bus
#Text=Bus Station ( Autóbuszállomás Veszprém ) , Jutasi utca 4 ( Center ) , ☏ +3688590751 , +36 88 590750 .

#Text=M - Sa 06:00 - 18:00 ; Su 06:00-17:00. Pápa ( hourly , one to one and half hour ) , Budapest ( hourly , two hours ) via Várpalota , Székesfehérvár ( one hour ) , Balatonfüred ( 5 per day , ~1½ hours ) , Sopron ( daily ) , Nagykanizsa ( daily five ) via Siófok and Fonyód .
#Text=Luggage storage : M - Sa 06:00 - 17:35 , Su and public holidays ) 06:00 - 16:35 , luggage storage fee : Ft 170 per hour .
#Text=By train
#Text=Train Station ( Veszprém Vasútállomás ) , Jutasi út ( N 2 km from Center ) .
#Text=Direct trains to/from Székesfehérvár via Várpalota ( East ) , Szombathely via Ajka , Sárvár ( West ) , Győr via Zirc , Pannonhalma ( north , the Cuha Valley Section is very nice ) .
#Text=By car
#Text=From Budapest take the M7 motorway , to Székesfehérvár then turning to #8 Main road .
#Text=From Győr take main road #82 , from Graz , Körmend main road #8 , from Balatonfüred take main road #73 .
#Text=Tapolca can be approached from a main road #77 .
#Text=Get around
#Text=Tourinform
#Text=Veszprém
#Text=, Óváros tér 2 .
#Text=( Downtown ) , ☏ +3688404548 , ✉ veszprem@tourinform.hu .
#Text=May-Sep : daily 10:00-18:00. Infos about transport , sights , programs , events , accommodation , gastronomy .
#Text=Free brochures , maps , E-Brochures .
#Text=Gift shop .
#Text=Public transport
#Text=Veszprém public transport solved by a dense bus network , details , Balaton Volan , interactiv map .
#Text=1 Bus Station - Papal Road round ( 05:10 - 18:10 )
#Text=2 Railway Station - Downtown - Railway Station ( 05:04 - 21:35 )
#Text=3 Haskovo turns - Csererdő ( 05:00 to 22:12 )
#Text=4 Railway Station-Downtown - Vámosi Road turns ( 04:00 to 22:05 )
#Text=5 Kádártai út – Tüzér u. ( 05:02 – 21:56 )
#Text=6 Haszkovó turn – Vámosi út ( 04:58 – 22:30 )
#Text=7 Haszkovó turn – downtown- Cholnokyváros - Haszkovó turn ( 05:15 – 22:05 )
#Text=8 Haszkovó turn – Pápai út/Csatárhegyi út ( 05:21 – 17:53 )
#Text=10 Cholnoky turn - Papal út ( 05:10 to 22:10 , only on weekdays , especially in the morning )
#Text=11 Railway Station – Cholnokyváros- Vámosi út ( 05:15 – 21:50 )
#Text=12 Bus station - Buhim Valley - Bus Station ( 07:00 – 16:00 , weekdays only )
#Text=13 Kádártai – Dózsaváros - Kádártai út ( 05:08 – 20:18 )
#Text=22 Bus station - Laci major ( Veszprém-Szabadságpuszta ) ( 05:10 - 22:30 )
#Text=23 Bus station - Kádárta-Gyulafirátót , turn ( 04:35 to 22:25 )
#Text=24 Bus station - Kádárta , railway stop ( 06:50 to 07:25 , weekdays only )
#Text=32 , 34 Cholnoky turn - Csererdő ( 05:10 to 22:10 , during the holidays Cholnoky - Valeo )
#Text=35 Bus Station - Csererdő ( 05:15 to 22:10 , weekdays only )
#Text=Some other lines runs only on special occasions .
#Text=Churches
#Text=St. Michael 's Cathedral ( A veszprémi érsekség főszékesegyháza , Szent Mihály-székesegyház ) , Vár utca 27 ( North end of Catle Hill ) , ☏ +3688328038 .
#Text=May-Oct : 10:00-18:00. Masses : Basilica M - Sa 19:00 , Su 09:00 , 10:30 , 19:00 .

#Text=Franciscan daily 07:00 , Chapel of St. Anne M - F ( during school time ) 07:15 , Su 10:00 ; Charles Church M - F 18:00 , Sa 18:00 , Su 8:00 , 18:00 , Rosary every day 17:30 ( open half hour before mass ) .
#Text=The principal cathedral of the Archdiocese of Veszprém .
#Text=Founded 10th century ( Romanesque ) origin , Gothic crypt ( end of 14th century ) .
#Text=The external facade showin medieval details .
#Text=Today 's form of neo-Romanesque , rebuilt in 1907-1910 , by architect Sándor Aigner .
#Text=The church nave with flat paneled ceiling is covered .
#Text=The column heads are designed model of the Árpád-era ( 10th-13th centuries ) carvings , during the renovation in 1907-1910. Both side naves have two-altars .
#Text=North side nave have ( at the main entrance to the left ) the Assumption and the St George 's altars .
#Text=The south nave ( the main entrance to the right ) have the St. Anne 's and the St. Emeric altars .
#Text=The church wall paintings made by Szirmay Anthony .
#Text=The wall paintings depict , among other things , Saints of the Árpád dynasty , Great St. Gregory , St. John of Nepomuk and St. Augustine of Hippo , and the four evangelists .
#Text=The glass windows
#Text=St. Stephen , St. Margaret , Happy Ilona , Queen Gizella , St. Joseph and St. Gellert shown .
#Text=There is a special relic : the Queen Gizella right forearm bones-
#Text=In the main hall of the Gothic crypt placed the headstones of Bánáss Laszlo and Peter Beriszló bishops of Veszprém .
#Text=A small room opening from here where Bishop Padányi Biró Martin in 1762 Baroque tomb is housed .
#Text=Donation .
#Text=Gizella Chapel ( Gizella-kápolna ) , Vár u. 16 ( between the Archbishop 's Palace and the High Provost Palace ) , ☏ +3688426088 , ✉ gizellakiralyne@ersekseg.veszprem.hu .
#Text=Tu -Su 10:00-17:00. The city 's oldest medieval building ; the 13th-century Gothic .
#Text=The 13th-century frescoes in Hungary include the oldest .
#Text=The arch keystones and the dragon 's chapters are unique .
#Text=Ft 300 .
#Text=St. Stephen 's Roman Catholic Franciscan church and monastery ( Szent István római katolikus , ferences templom és rendház ) , Vár u. 33 , ☏ +3688426088 .
#Text=Closed .
#Text=In addition Bíró-Giczey house .
#Text=Baroque , 1723 to 1730 .
#Text=The facade is transformed and expanded with a tower in 1909 .
#Text=Inside ceiling painting was made in 1798-1801 , a Bucher Xaver creation .
#Text=Ányos Pál 's tomb in the crypt , 1784 .
#Text=The benches carved in the end of the 18th century , copf style .
#Text=St. Emeric
#Text=Roman Catholic Piarist Church
#Text=( Piarista templom , Szent Imre-templom ) , Vár u. 12-14 , ☏ +3688 426-088 .
#Text=Between May and October : Tu - Su 10:00 -17:00 , Monday holiday. .
#Text=Built in 1823-1833 , classicist style .
#Text=Renewed in 1901 .
#Text=Equipment : five altars ( classicist , around 1840 )
#Text=Museums
#Text=Salesianum
#Text=Archbishopric Tourism Centre
#Text=( Szaléziánum Érsekségi Turisztikai Központ , Madaras ház ) , Vár u. 31 . , ☏ +3688580528 , ✉ info@szalezianum.hu .
#Text=Jan-Feb : Tu - Sa 10:00 - 17:00 ; Mar-May : Tu - Su 10:00 - 17:00 ; Jun-Aug : daily 09:00 - 18:00 ; Sep-Dec : Tu - Su 10:00-17:00.
#Text=The place got its name from Saint Francis de Sales ( the patron saint of writers and journalists ) .
#Text=Four levels exhibition area .
#Text=Here can be seen : exclusive , frescoed halls , Violin Making Workshop .
#Text=Herbal Garden .
#Text=There is a cafe .
#Text=The café offers : Wide selection of tea and coffee , soft drinks and refreshments .
#Text=Halimba herbal teas .
#Text=Daily offer fresh cakes .
#Text=It is possible to taste the special archbishopric communion wine .
#Text=Try the Pannonhalma Abbey 's herbal liqueur and consume other hungaricums .
#Text=At the interactive tables you get acquainted about housing services , the archdiocese and the city 's history and programs .
#Text=Also there is a Gift and Bookstore .
#Text=( Holy Scriptures , prayer books , calendars , postcards , greeting cards , candles , CDs and DVDs ) .
#Text=Former Bishop ( now Archbishop ) Palace ( Püspöki ( ma Érseki )
#Text=palota ) , Szentháromság tér/Vár u. 16-18.. May-Oct : Tu - Su 10:00-17:00. Only guided tours ! .
#Text=Late Baroque , a Jakab Fellner creation .
#Text=The Great Hall and Chapel frescoes are baroque from the 18th century .
#Text=The Picture Hall preserve the paintings made of bishops and archbishop of Veszprém .
#Text=The image , porcelain and furniture collections are very valuable .
#Text=The wood-paneling Baroque Library Hall made in the second half of the 18th century .
#Text=Its library has about 60,000 volumes counted .
#Text=In the Archives of the Episcopal has got Hungary
#Text=earliest original remained private document , the Guden 's testament of 1079 .
#Text=Queen Gizella
#Text=Museum
#Text=( Gizella Királyné Múzeum ) , Vár utca 35 , ☏ +3688426088 , ✉ gizellakiralyne@ersekseg.veszprem.hu .
#Text=In Tejfalussy House ( Baroque , 1772 ) .
#Text=The collection include religious artifacts , bishop-prelate bequests , donations to the Queen .
#Text=In the cellar is a valuable lapidary
#Text=Castle Gate ( Heroic Gate ) and Castle Museum ( Várkapu ( Hősi kapu ) ) , Vár u. 3 . ( South part of the Castle ) .
#Text=15-17th centuries , rebuilt in memory of the World War I victims , The tower of its include the Castle Museum .
#Text=Ft 600/400 , Combined ticket ( Heroes ' Gate , and the Tower valid ) :
#Text=Adult : Ft 800
#Text=Student pensioner : Ft 500 .
#Text=House of Arts & the Csikász Gallery ( Csikász Galéria , Művészetek Háza ) , Vár utca 17 , ☏ +3688425204 .
#Text=M - Sa 10:00-18:00. Full price/reduced admission Ft 500/400 ( 2014 ) , Castle Gallery temporary exhibitions
#Text=full price/reduced admission
#Text=Granary temporary exhibitions
#Text=full price/reduced admission Ft 300/200 .
#Text=Vass Collection ( Modern Képtár- Vass László Gyűjtemény ) , Vár utca 5-7 ( Castle ) , ☏ +3688 561-310 , ✉ info@vasscollection.hu .
#Text=M - Sa 10:00-18:00. In a listed building .
#Text=Built in neoclassical style , circa 1820
#Text=Full price/reduced admission Ft 800/500 .
#Text=Hungarian Construction Industry Museum - Brick Museum ( Magyar Építőipari Múzeum - Téglamúzeum ) , Vár utca 29-31 ( Castle ) , ☏ +3688578310 , fax : +3688578310 , ✉ epmuzeum@vnet.hu .
#Text=Tu - Su 10:00-18:00. Tegularium - collection of the Hungarian ' stamped ' bricks .
#Text=Main unit : ' Stove-house ' ( Kályhásmester-ház ) , address=Szent István u. 07 . , hours=M - F 10:00 - 18:00 , tel : +36 88 578310 , fax : +3688578310
#Text=Dubniczay House , László Károly collection ( Dubniczay-ház , László Károly gyűjtemény ) , Vár u. 29. .
#Text=Baroque , 1751 .
#Text=Now offices and an exhibit place .
#Text=The László collection include 20th century art , paintings , sculptures , graphics ( mostly from Hungarin artists ) .
#Text=Full price/reduced admission Ft 1000/600 .
#Text=Fire Tower ( Tűztorony , Vigyázó torony ) , Vár u. 9 ( South end of Catle ) .
#Text=Former called ' Protector Tower ' .
#Text=The base is medieval , the upper part made in 1814-1817 based on Tumler Henrik plans .
#Text=From its balcony the whole city can be seen .
#Text=The clock will ring every quarter hour and at every hour played a recruiting song of composer Anthony Csermák
#Text=Adult Ft 400 , Student pensioner : Ft 300 .
